net.openhft.chronicle.threads

Interface TimingPauser

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Pauser
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BusyTimedPauser, LongPauser, TimeoutPauser

    public interface TimingPauser
extends Pauser
    Marker interface to show we support pause(long timeout, TimeUnit timeUnit)

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface net.openhft.chronicle.threads.Pauser

    • Field Summary

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void pause(long timeout, TimeUnit timeUnit)
      Pauses but keep tracks of accumulated pause time and throws if timeout exceeded
